name: Sushi Slam
description:
Sushi Slam is a 2D 1v1 local fighting game. Fight to beat your opponent, claiming the sushi as yours.

Local 2-player keyboard support.

Credits:

Ben Wilson (Design, Code, A/V, Sound) - http://www.zerofifty.one
Daniel Cohen (Design, Code) - https://twitter.com/faemir
Matt Blickem (Design, Code) - https://twitter.com/mattblickem
Kathryn Zalecka (Concept Art, Environment Art, 2D Art) - http://kathrynzalecka.com
David Read (Design, Code)

Made for a game jam in June 2014

Code: https://github.com/explosivose/SushiSlam
